snippet.title: Ciel Fledge: A Daughter Raising Simulator - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Take a young girl under your wing and raise her to adulthood. Ciel Fledge: A Daughter Raising Simulator launches in Autumn/Fall 2019. 

Find out more here: https://pqube.co.uk/cielfledge/

Featuring compelling management gameplay and a loveable cast of characters, it’s up to you to manage your daughter: using a handy schedule to fill her days with different classes, hobbies, and friends to hang out with. With an enchanting art-style, and a smooth instrumental soundtrack inspired by Japanese City Pop, lose yourself in the wholesome sights and sounds of ARK-3… a magnificent city built in the sky. 

Follow PQube Games on social media!

Discord: https://discord.gg/pqubegames 
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pqubegames/ 
Twitter: https://twitter.com/PQubeGames 
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/pqubegames/

#CielFledge
